mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY pno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (pname, price, size, quantity, color, review_cnt) VALUES (#{pname}, #{price}, #{size}, #{quantity}, #{color}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET pname = #{pname}, price = #{price}, size = #{size}, quantity = #{quantity}, color = #{color}, review_cnt = #{review_cnt} WHERE pno = #{pno}
